---
title: "Forest mortality at Guadarrama National Park"
---


This repository contains analysis for the study of several stands forests at Guadarrama National Park (Central Spain). 

- [Temporal analysis of several spectral indices](iv_temporal_series.qmd) from Remote sensing of forest stands with contrasting healthy status

- [Exploration of the cummulative precipitation](cummulative_precipitation.qmd) of the meteorological statios close to our study sites

- [Spatial dashboard viewer](https://dendroinia.github.io/guadarrama_dec_spatial/)
